name: The Lovebirds - Demo
description:
Welcome to Saint Marionette's theater!

Tonight's show is all about love and faith...
Our life here m̷a̷y̷ ̷b̷e̷ ̷a̷ ̷s̷i̷m̷u̷l̷a̷t̷i̷o̷n̷, ̷f̷u̷l̷l̷ ̷o̷f̷ ̷s̷t̷a̷t̷i̷c̷ ̷p̷a̷i̷n̷,
but our feelings are very real! 🕊️🖤

After you come and see our show, you'll never feel like you're alone! 🖤

We'll always be there with you! 🖤

İ̶̳͈̩̺̣͇'̵̬͕͒͌̈́L̶̻͕̲̱͕̔͑̿ͅL̵̫͖͓̱̟̞͖̉ ̸̨͚̹͍̗̯͚͑̾̀̉̚͜͝͝Ạ̴͈̫̱̯̈́͊̐̾̈́̾͝L̸̗͇̻̘͚̑̑͑̓̊͐̂̉͝W̴͔̽A̵̢͍͉̾͒̈́̃̄̂͊̈͜͜͠Y̵̛͔͋̓̎͛͋́S̶̡̯̊̀̊ ̵̧̤͖̹̮̂̉̈͆̐̚͝B̵̜̭̻̰̰̬̙̦̓̃̋͑̃Ȩ̷̖̝͔̼̯͓̦͓͖̓̍̈̔͗̕̕ ̸̢̡͕̗͐̾͂͌͗̾͝H̷͇̞̳̭̪͌̽̓̄̅́͂̚̕͝Ę̷̼̹̔̄͝R̴͈̙̜̈͐͝È̸͉̬͖̭͎ ̶̡͉̮͍̩̟́̿͊̾̑͑̏͘͠W̵̟̲͙̰̹̠̗̑̍̍I̶̧͓̥͈͔̠̐T̷̨̫̂̒̚ͅH̷̡̙̠̲̱̗̞͚͍͕͂̇̉͐̒̏̓̕ ̴̛͈̪͙̤͔̰̹̄͆̈́͛͌̎̐̀̈Y̶̰͍͙̓́̌̌̓̈̈Ő̸̧̟̼̥̥̘̼͇͝U̸͕͎͉̪̠͎͖͍͋͒̋̌̎̈̕͠͝

 

This game will give you an extremely immersive horror experience by messing with your mind as much as with the game files. It breaks the fourth wall with the most chilling methods.

You are in charge of the story and how it goes. The full game will have up to 20 different endings, based on your ability to choose between good and evil.

In the end, you may not be able to tell what is real...
And what is not...
